Headline: #95 95th, #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute near 95th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: 95 95th, 112 Vincennes/111th buses temp. rerouted EB: 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette and 95th; WB: 95th, State, 87th and Halsted due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th, #112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 95th/Eggleston due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette and 95th.

Westbound buses will operate via 95th, State, 87th and Halsted.

Allow extra travel time.
